meanings.definition: A person who is enthusiastic about photography.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a real shutterbug, always carrying a camera wherever he goes.
meanings.sent2: The shutterbug captured the beauty of the sunset in his photographs.
meanings.sent3: The shutterbug couldn't resist snapping a picture of a squirrel with a tiny camera.
meanings.sent4: She was a shutterbug, freezing moments in time with her camera like a magician.
meanings.sent5: The shutterbug's passion for photography was as bright as the flash of a camera.

meanings.definition: To take photographs frequently or habitually.
meanings.sent1: I shutterbug every moment of my vacation to create lasting memories.
meanings.sent2: She loves to shutterbug during family gatherings to document special moments.
meanings.sent3: The tourist decided to shutterbug the famous landmarks in the city.
meanings.sent4: As the storm approached, he began to shutterbug the dark clouds rolling in.
meanings.sent5: The photographer would shutterbug the world, one click at a time, capturing its beauty.
